subject: Baseball
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Homer Bailey and the Cincinnati Reds agreed to a one-year, $5.35 million deal, ensuring a record low for baseball salary arbitration hearings
snippet: The right-hander Homer Bailey and the Cincinnati Reds agreed to a one-year, $5.35 million deal, ensuring a record low for baseball salary arbitration hearings
